presentation.item10: If you wish to discuss various subjects related to communication or sustainable development, do not hesitate to contact me! In the meantime, I invite you to consult my achievements by browsing my site and to learn more about my experiences and my training,

pressrelation.item21: a refuge for goldfish at the Paris Aquarium. A great example of the many press coverage from the following press release. This subject, which I decided to deal with during a no news period, created a national and international buzz. We achieved no less than 254 media coverage in 1 month, compared to an average of 52 for the other months. The numerous videos, articles and publications have significantly increased the number of visitors to the aquarium during this period.

Reflection on the animation of the stand, negotiation of the location and the available material. Relationship with partners. Staff management, accommodation and planning.
